Song.title: Join All The Glorious Names
Song.copyright: Words by Isaac Watts, adapted by Bob Kauflin Music by Bob Kauflin © 1998 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Join [C]all the glorious [Gsus G]names Of [C]wisdom, love, and [Gsus G]power That [Am]mortals ever [Am/G]knew,{,} that angels [F2]ever bore [| F2 ] All [C]are too poor to [Gsus G]speak{,} Your [C]vast and priceless [Gsus G]worth Too [Am]poor to set my [Am/G]Savior [F2]forth
Chorus: Je[F]sus, [C] [ ]Your name is [G]glori[Am]ous Our [F]Prophet, [C]Priest, and [G]King [D] Je[F]sus, [C] [ ]You’re reigning [G]over [Am]us And for[F]ever[C]more Your [F]praises{,} [Gsus]we [G]will [C2 | G2 | C2 | G2 |]sing
Verse 2: Great [C]prophet of my [Gsus G]God My [C]tongue would bless Your [Gsus G]name Through [Am]You the joyful [Am/G]news{,} of our sal[F2]vation came The [C]long awaited [Gsus G]news{,} of [C]every sin for[Gsus G]giv’n Of [Am]hell subdued, and [Am/G]peace with [F2]heav’n
Verse 3: Je[C]sus, my great high [Gsus G]priest You [C]shed Your blood and [Gsus G]died My [Am]guilty conscience [Am/G]seeks{,} no sacri[F2]fice beside Your [C]pure and precious [Gsus G]blood, for [C]all my sins at[Gsus G]oned And [Am]now it pleads be[Am/G]fore the [F2]throne
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 join all the glorious names of wisdom love and power that mortals ever knew that angels ever bore all are too poor to speak your vast and priceless worth too poor to set my savior forth chorus jesus your name is glorious our prophet priest and king jesus youre reigning over us and forevermore your praises we will sing verse 2 great prophet of my god my tongue would bless your name through you the joyful news of our salvation came the long awaited news of every sin forgivn of hell subdued and peace with heavn verse 3 jesus my great high priest you shed your blood and died my guilty conscience seeks no sacrifice beside your pure and precious blood for all my sins atoned and now it pleads before the throne

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C2 | G2 | C2 | G2 |]
Verse 1: Join [C]all the glorious [Gsus G]names Of [C]wisdom, love, and [Gsus G]power That [Am]mortals ever [Am/G]knew,{,} that angels [F2]ever bore [| F2 ] All [C]are too poor to [Gsus G]speak{,} Your [C]vast and priceless [Gsus G]worth Too [Am]poor to set my [Am/G]Savior [F2]forth
Chorus: Je[F]sus, [C] [ ]Your name is [G]glori[Am]ous Our [F]Prophet, [C]Priest, and [G]King [D] Je[F]sus, [C] [ ]You’re reigning [G]over [Am]us And for[F]ever[C]more Your [F]praises{,} [Gsus]we [G]will [C2 | G2 | C2 | G2 |]sing [C2 | G2 | D2 | A2 |]To key change Verse 2: Great [C]prophet of my [Gsus G]God My [C]tongue would bless Your [Gsus G]name Through [Am]You the joyful [Am/G]news{,} of our sal[F2]vation came The [C]long awaited [Gsus G]news{,} of [C]every sin for[Gsus G]giv’n Of [Am]hell subdued, and [Am/G]peace with [F2]heav’n
{new_page} {key:D} Verse 3: Je[D]sus, my great high [Asus A]priest You [D]shed Your blood and [Asus A]died My [Bm]guilty conscience [Bm/A]seeks{,} no sacri[G2]fice beside Your [D]pure and precious [Asus A]blood, for [D]all my sins at[Asus A]oned And [Bm]now it pleads be[Bm/A]fore the [G2]throne
Chorus: Je[G]sus, [D] [ ]Your name is [A]glori[Bm]ous Our [G]Prophet, [D]Priest, and [A]King [E] Je[G]sus, [D] [ ]You’re reigning [A]over [Bm]us And for[G]ever[D]more Your [G]praises{,} [Asus]we [A]will [D2 | A2 | D2 | A2 |]sing
Ending: [D2 | A2 | D2 | A2 |]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 join all the glorious names of wisdom love and power that mortals ever knew that angels ever bore all are too poor to speak your vast and priceless worth too poor to set my savior forth chorus jesus your name is glorious our prophet priest and king jesus youre reigning over us and forevermore your praises we will sing to key change verse 2 great prophet of my god my tongue would bless your name through you the joyful news of our salvation came the long awaited news of every sin forgivn of hell subdued and peace with heavn verse 3 jesus my great high priest you shed your blood and died my guilty conscience seeks no sacrifice beside your pure and precious blood for all my sins atoned and now it pleads before the throne chorus jesus your name is glorious our prophet priest and king jesus youre reigning over us and forevermore your praises we will sing ending
